title: Website
text: My name is Quang Mai, an aspiring UX Designer with a background in Graphic Design. I strive for aesthetic & functional designs that amplify human connections! In my free time, you can catch me watching Tsai Ming-liang’s Vive l’amour, skimming Dribbble for UX inspirations and reading Wikipedia entries.

title: About
text:
Bioraphy
A scribbler at heart who loves UX Design, Graphic Design and Writing, I strive for aesthetic & functional designs that amplify human connections.
A junior in the Bachelor of Information @ UofT. I always start my designs with a ballpoint pen, sketching blue lines and dots first. Sincerely, I think all good designs begin with a small, minute detail! This is reflected in my work and projects, especially my experiences in User Experience Design, Graphic Design, Visual Design, Writing, Branding and Social Media Marketing!
